projects.title: Chiara's Cafe
projects.background: We are helping Chiara's Cafe to build a new booking system to allow their customers to reserve a table for their lunch time menus

roles.title: Programme Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for how the management of the project and also the delivery of booking system.

roles.title: Technical Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for the management of the development teams.

roles.title: Delivery Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for how the delivery and integration of booking system for the client.

projects.title: Hazik's Hats
projects.background: We're creating an online tool for Hazik's Hat customers to design their own hats and get them delivered to their homes.

roles.title: Project Manager
roles.description: We're looking for someone to manage a small team of developers to create systems.

roles.title: Developer
roles.description: This person will be responsible for the development of the front-end web screens.

roles.title: Design Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for designing all the UX and UI for the new system.

projects.title: Joe's Jabbers
projects.background: We are helping Joe's Jabber's boxing gym to implement a new system to attract new and upcoming boxers

roles.title: Programme Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for how the management of the project.

roles.title: Technical Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for the management of the development teams.

roles.title: Solution Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for how the delivery and integration of online attraction tool.

projects.title: Chris' Club
projects.background: We're looking to create a solution for Chris' Club clients to get live financial data on the go.

roles.title: Mobile Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for running the mobile project.

roles.title: Design Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsbile for leading the design thinking workshops for ideation.

roles.title: Technical Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for how the delivery of the system.

projects.title: Mark's Mops
projects.background: We are helping Mark's Mops to create a new employee management system including payroll and time management.

roles.title: Programme Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for how the management of the project and also the delivery of booking system.

roles.title: Technical Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for the management of the development teams.

roles.title: Implementation Lead
roles.description: This person will be responsible for implementing the system into Mark's Mop's head office.

challenges.task: Create a function that will allow you to enter a date and time which will check the database to see if this available
Create some CSS to turn a checkbox into a mobile-like toggle.
Design a screen to allow user to upload a file and display it on the screen

resources.description: Adobe Mobile UX - Do's and Don'ts
